Residential House "Glenkolodezi"

Task: design a house for one family. Mandatory requirements: 2 floors, basement, 2 bathrooms, balcony or terrace, compliance with SNIP.

The work was created based on Scottish castles of the 16th-18th centuries.

Used programs:

  • Autocad
  • Revit
  • Blender
  • Photoshop
